properties.entry: SELECT PLC_NAME, PLC_ADDRESS, PLC_PNUMBER FROM "Place" WHERE DAREA_CODE = ? AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'PP'

SELECT FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME FROM "Image" WHERE ORIGIN_NAME LIKE ?
